item.title: Porter - Recovering Delivery for Digital Rhetoric and Human Computer Interaction
item.description: One Liner Rhetoric as a distrubted and inventive force, and delivery as techne provides different frames for examining rhetoric in motion and in action. Summary Looks at delivery Uses, Thoughts, and Connections What do you think about it, how might you use this, does it fit?
